  • Constructor Details

    • QuestionBuilder

      public QuestionBuilder()
      Creates a new question builder instance.
      N.B. question is considered as null, answers is an empty list and correct answer id is set to -1 (invalid value).

  • Method Details

    • setQuestion

      public void setQuestion(String theQuestion) throws InvalidQuestionException
      Sets question text.
      Parameters:
      theQuestion - question text.
      Throws:
      InvalidQuestionException - if theQuestion is null or empty.

    • addAnswer

      public void addAnswer(String answer) throws InvalidAnswerException
      Adds an answer (appends after last answer).
      Parameters:
      answer - answer to add.
      Throws:
      InvalidAnswerException - if answer is null or empty.

    • updateAnswer

      public void updateAnswer(int questionId, String answer) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException, InvalidAnswerException
      Updates an answer, given its id.
      Parameters:
      questionId - answer id, starting at 0.
      answer - updated answer (replacing older one).
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if questionId is out of bounds.
      InvalidAnswerException - if updated answer is invalid.

    • removeAnswer

      public void removeAnswer(int answerId) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Removes an answer, given its id.
      Parameters:
      answerId - answer id, starting at 0.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if answerId is out of bounds.

    • setCorrectAnswerId

      public void setCorrectAnswerId(int correctAnswerId)
      Sets correct answer id.
      Parameters:
      correctAnswerId - correct answer id.

    • getQuestion

      public Question getQuestion() throws InvalidQuestionException
      Returns built question.
      Returns:
      built question.
      Throws:
      InvalidQuestionException - if question is null, answers is empty, or if correct answer id is missing or out of bounds.

    • getAnswersAsArray

      private String[] getAnswersAsArray()
      Returns answers as an array.
      Returns:
      answers as an array, or null if there is no answer.
